name: useCounter
description: Custom hook that manages a counter with increment, decrement, reset, and setCount functionalities.

props.name: initialValue
props.description: The initial value for the counter.

returns.name: decrement
returns.description: Function to decrement the counter by 1.

returns.name: increment
returns.description: Function to increment the counter by 1.

returns.name: reset
returns.description: Function to reset the counter to its initial value.

returns.name: setCount
returns.description: Function to set a specific value to the counter.
